Posts.EditableText:
Hi guys,

I received recently a review criticizing my lack of synonyms when using objects.  How can we do that?
Posts.HTML:
Hi guys,

I received recently a review criticizing my lack of synonyms when using objects. How can we do that?

Posts.EditableText: For the object in question, go to the "Object" tab, and put them in to the "Other names" bit at the top.
Posts.HTML: For the object in question, go to the "Object" tab, and put them in to the "Other names" bit at the top.

Posts.EditableText: Oops, i forgot that. Sorry for my silly question
Posts.HTML: Oops, i forgot that. Sorry for my silly question
